Uses of Interface
org.fluentjava.iterators.ExtendedIterator

Packages that use ExtendedIterator
org.fluentjava.collections Package with extended collections. 
org.fluentjava.iterators Package with iterators that are themselves iterables. 
 

Uses of ExtendedIterator in org.fluentjava.collections
 

Methods in org.fluentjava.collections that return ExtendedIterator
abstract  ExtendedIterator<E> AbstractEnumerable.iterator()
           
 ExtendedIterator<E> ForwardingFluentSet.iterator()
           
 ExtendedIterator<E> Enumerator.iterator()

Uses of ExtendedIterator in org.fluentjava.iterators
 

Classes in org.fluentjava.iterators that implement ExtendedIterator
 class AbstractExtendedIterator<T>
          ExtendedIterator that does the default behavior for iterator() and method: returns itself.
 class CompositeIterator<F,S>
          Iterator that takes two Iterators, Iterables, or Arrays (not necessarily both of the same type), and iterates through both, preserving the order.
 class CountingIterator<T>
          Extended Iterator Adapter that counts how many times next was invoked, mainly used to count the number of the iteration.
 class ExtendedIteratorAdapter<T>
          Adapter that adapts iterable's iterators, iterators (including extended iterators, making this a wrapper as well) and arrays.
 class LimitedIterator<T>
          Iterator that takes at most n elements of an adapted iterator.
 

Methods in org.fluentjava.iterators that return ExtendedIterator
 ExtendedIterator<T> ExtendedIterableAdapter.iterator()
           
 ExtendedIterator<T> AbstractExtendedIterator.iterator()
           
 ExtendedIterator<T> ExtendedIterable.iterator()
